title: New Client can't start games
body: I can load into the new client just fine but the play button is greyed out.

replies.body: Pesky gray play button. Typically when the play button is unclickable it means that your connection with our servers has gone into a dormant state for some reason. Your client can't reliably talk with our servers, so it can't let you into any lobbies. Let's try [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can narrow down the main issue. Hit me back up if that doesn't help!
Restarting the client should fix this.
